snippet: The second week of the sometimes murderous cold snap poses the question: which is the greater threat to Europe, fracking or a dependence on Russia natural gas?
abstract: The second week of the sometimes murderous cold snap poses the question: which is the greater threat to Europe, fracking or a dependence on Russia natural gas?
lead_paragraph: LONDON - Scavenging wolves have been sneaking into hilltop villages in central Italy, with one sighted uncomfortably close to the gates of an elementary school.

headline.main: Deep Freeze Brings the Wolf to Europe's Door, Literally and Figuratively
